price: Hakika katika hayo yapo mazingatio. Na kwa yakini Sisi ni wenye kuwafanyia mtihani.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبۡتَلِينَ
footnotes: Hakika katika kisa hichi yapo mazingatio na mawaidha mengi. Na hakika Sisi tunawajaribu (tunawapa mitihani) waja wetu kwa kheri na shari. Na ndani ya nafsi zao wana utayarisho wa yote hayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyātin wa-in kunnā lamub'talīna
